entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
